public SwerveDrive(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController[] motors,
                   double[] motorCoefficients,

Constructs a swerve drive from the specified motors, motor coefficients and encoders.

Parameters:
motors - The motors to be used by the swerve drive.
motorCoefficients - The motor coefficients to be used by the swerve drive.
encoders - The encoders to be used by the swerve drive.
